author: ianna
body:
* Middle section material changed from AlBe to Al 2219

The material of the outer part of the current central beam pipe is Al 2219. AlBe which was used in early studies of the beam pipe was finally discarded for cost and production risk reasons.

* Restructure of beam-pipe files as suggested by @davidlange6 
* Update scenarios accordingly
title: Update 2017 Beam-pipe Middle Section
